attributes.action: Make census records up to 1940 freely available to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These documents are of vital importance to everyone researching their family history, many groups and individuals cannot continue their research without this information. The normal 100 years seal on census mean it may be longer than 2021 or longer before these are available to the public. There must be a way of making this information available to the public without threatening the security of the nation or its people that are still living that were on it? I am asking for these census records to be opened immediately
